title: Alpha Clinet  Download??
body: Hello..i was wondering if alpha clinet is live and can be downloaded and if no when it will be release..( i play in EU West server is that matters)

replies.body: can i know why my clinet download goes up to 88% and says there is an error in downloading?? plese i cant play the game without it downloading\

Players who currently have access to the alpha client can download it [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).  Make sure to select the region specific to you.  If you have any feedback or concerns, reach out to the alpha community through their boards.  Good luck!
